===="Fruits Aplenty" Machine====
This machine is located at the northernmost point of the tribal settlement.
* The player can prepare {{Item|Fruits Aplenty|x=1}} by submitting the required ingredients and hitting the front with a [[Tatankasaur]] or [[Collective of Plenty]] character.
* The first time the player operates this machine, it will also give {{Item|Recipe: Fruits Aplenty|x=1}}.

====Grainfruit Puffer====<!-- name taken from furnishing replica -->
This machine is located next to [[Atolli]].
* The player can prepare {{Item|Puffed Grainfruit Bars|x=1}} by submitting the required ingredients.
